sentences.sContent: But this should be a big day for all people living in the meningitis belt.
sentences.sContent_eng: But this should be a big day for all people living in the meningitis belt.
sentences.sCn: 不过，今天应当是所有生活在脑膜炎地带国家人民的重要日子。

sentences.sContent: Epidemic meningitis is not the biggest killer in Africa, but it is one of the most greatly feared of all diseases.
sentences.sContent_eng: Epidemic meningitis is not the biggest killer in Africa, but it is one of the most greatly feared of all diseases.
sentences.sCn: 流行性脑膜炎并非是非洲最大的杀手，但却是所有疾病中最令人感到恐惧的其中一个。

sentences.sContent: She pointed out the meningitis vaccine as well as new vaccines for preventing diarrheal disease and pneumonia and a new test for tuberculosis.
sentences.sContent_eng: She pointed out the meningitis vaccine as well as new vaccines for preventing diarrheal disease and pneumonia and a new test for tuberculosis.
sentences.sCn: 她指出了脑膜炎疫苗、预防腹泻和肺炎的新疫苗，以及一项针对肺结核的新测试这一连串的胜利。

trans.tranOther: a serious illness in which the outer part of the brain becomes swollen
